overview:
Will is crafting the future of connected convergence as Founder | Chief Creative Director at Wiretree.

Focusing on design and experience, Will leads creative design efforts to develop fresh new approaches across all types of media, both digital and traditional. He directs user-interface design, user experience, film shoots and web work to meet and exceed an audience’s expectations.

Prior to founding Wiretree Mr. Weyer was Senior Design Director for USWeb/CKS in Atlanta, responsible for managing graphic artists, providing technical solutions and implementing design concepts.

Before joining USWeb/CKS, Will worked at IBM Global Services as a Media Director in the hot scene of e-business mixed with world class design and distribution.

Will holds Specialized Associates Degrees in both Digital Media and Film & Video from Full Sail and has experience directing a variety of multimedia projects that have gained global recognition.

image.attribution: Will Weyer / Will Weyer
